title: Update Subscription Payment Method
description: A customer with a recurring subscription needs to update the credit card used for their monthly payments.

tasks.description: Provide the customer with a secure portal or link to update their payment information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent guides the customer to the secure payment update form.

tasks.description: Confirm that the new payment method has been successfully saved for the subscription.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the update in the system.
